about_me.headline: Who I am
about_me.title: About me
about_me.intro: Hey there, I'm Lukas! Write some IT-related information about yourself. Why are you passionate about coding? What inspires you to improve your programming skills?
about_me.question1: Where are you based? Are you open to remote work or relocation?
about_me.question2: Show that you are open-minded. Are you enthusiastic about learning new technologies?
about_me.question3: Describe your problem-solving approach. Do you learn from challenges and search for efficient solutions? Keywords: analytical thinking, creativity, persistence, collaboration.

skills.intro: A short introduction of your skills. Highlight your experience with different front-end technologies and emphasise your openness to learning and adapting to new technologies. Show how important it is for you to keep up with rapid changes in web development.
skills.contactMe: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

contact.encourageText: Encourage people to contact you and describe what role you are interested in. Show that you will add value to their projects through your work.
contact.privacyText3: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
contact.privacyError: You must agree to the privacy policy

testimonials.headline: What my colleagues say about me

first.text: Lukas is an amazing collaborator. His problem-solving skills are top-notch.
first.author: H. Janisch – Team Partner

second.text: Working with Lukas is a pleasure. He delivers quality work consistently.
second.author: M. Schmidt – Project Lead

third.text: Lukas always goes the extra mile to ensure the team succeeds.
third.author: S. Keller – Colleague

projects.headline: portfolio
projects.description: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

join.name: Join
join.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

elpollo.name: El Pollo Loco
elpollo.description: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

dabubble.name: DA Bubble
dabubble.description: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.
